# Product Image Assets

Place the final JPEG/PNG assets for the Blue Ocean product showcase in this folder. Use the file names referenced by `src/data/products.js`, for example:

- `structured-panel-tote.jpg`
- `mini-satchel-6494-2.jpg`
- `lucky-girl-w219013.jpg`
- `animal-print-shoulder-bag.jpg`
- `lucky-girl-w219010.jpg`
- `ha930m-platform-slide.jpg`
- `backpack-8b057.jpg`
- `ed-cherry-tote.jpg`
- `ha898m-floral-slide.jpg`
- `baindaishu-8518-tote.jpg`
- `scarf-handle-tote-6-22.jpg`
- `lucky-girl-w215111.jpg`
- `lk-l270-tote.jpg`
- `ha918m-cross-strap-slide.jpg`
- `ha916m-cork-thong.jpg`
- `ha907m-classic-slide.jpg`
- `ha922m-embellished-clog.jpg`

Once the images are added, run `npm run dev` and Vite will serve them from `/products/<file-name>`.
